title: Auto-onboard smallholder farmers
description: 60% of Africa's population is engaged in some kind of agricultural activity. Onboarding smallholder farmers to Cardano lacks incentives.
solution: We use satellites to detect field boundaries to identify and onboard farmers, so they can claim financial incentives and link to consumers.
